title: Amazon Best Sellers Rank (BSR) Explained for KDP Low Content Books and Self Published Authors [2022]
description:

Amazon's Bestseller Rank shows how well a product sells relative to other products in a particular category. 
I think there are a lot of KDP low-content book publishers and self-published authors on Amazon who misunderstand BSR ( Best Sellers Rank) and use this information in the wrong way for researching niches or keywords for their books. 
After watching this video, you will be able to accurately interpret BSR Rates to increase your sales and Amazon KDP Royalties. Furthermore, you will understand why you couldn't reach the results like "$150 a Day" or "$1000 per month" after creating some similar content about the niches you had watched on Youtube Videos. #kdp #selfpublishing #kindlepublishing #amazonkdp #selfpublishing #selfpublishing201

how to promote your book on amazon
